title: Musical Instrument Dingbats
content:
hi all,

I was wondering if anyone could recommend some musical instrument  
dingbat fonts. Hope you can help.

thanks.

 [‹ the high price of type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917021555/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15647 "Go to previous forum topic") [Gerrit Noordzij's \_The stroke: theory of writing\_ ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917021555/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15712 "Go to next forum topic")
author: begsini

comments.content:
many of the font sets from [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917021555/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/House%252BIndustries) include illustrations:  
 [http://houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=22&subpage=viewillustrati...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917021555/http:/houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=22&subpage=viewillustrations "http://houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=22&subpage=viewillustrations")  
 [http://houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=142&subpage=viewillustrat...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080917021555/http:/houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=142&subpage=viewillustrations "http://houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=142&subpage=viewillustrations")

great.

thank you all for the suggestions.
